price: Magsasabi sila: “Tunay kayo ay dating pumupunta sa amin buhat sa kanan.”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
